website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best gas grill on the market when it comes to quality, spaciousness, and results.
pros: A beautiful grill from a reputable company
Three spacious burners, easy-start push button ignition, and cooking capabilities that make grilling a pleasure
cons: A few reports of faulty fuel gauges and rust have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Love the grill, but not buying from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I would never again buy a grill from amazon. We got this grill, paid for assembly only for it not to heat up and work properly. We contacted Amazon that same week of set up and they didn’t do anything at all for us. They said we could exchange it but wouldn’t get set up and we had to take the current one (that we didn’t set up) apart on our own. We just returned it and went elsewhere to purchase this same grill. We love the grill and we love that we got it at a store that helped us in person make sure it worked.
customer_reviews.author: MEmbick

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Just bought it. Had Amazon assemble. Is great. Well built. I bought this model because of the door in the front. I think it looks sharper than the open format they now have on the new model. Grilled steaks on it and came out excellent. The even-ness of the heat is what makes Weber the best value in this price-range. The only thing I would change on this model is to have the handrail be made from steel-it is now plastic. It probably is better for heat, but it is cheap looking and feeling. Other than that, rock-solid.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Devor

customer_reviews.title: Not your old Weber
customer_reviews.text: Had a 6 year old Weber Genesis E310 that was a perfect grill. Once it had reached its end of life I never thought of purchasing a different brand of grill. I needed a smaller grill and went with this Spirit E-310. The temperature always is way to much no matter where or how I have them set. Constant flareups even with the center off. The quality is definitively cheaper materials. Came with scratched and dented parts the front knobs fall off when you use them. The price should be much lower for this quality. If you are just going to cook Hot Dogs this is the grill for you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Denni

customer_reviews.title: Crazy great grill!!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat a weber!! Great grill but it's not as easy to put together as I have read! Had some dents on the grill. Had to take the rubber mallet to bend the dents out! I would say if you can buy it already put together I recommend it! Same price less work!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Difficult grate to clean
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this grill except the grate. The heavy cast iron grate is difficult to clean because brushes don't reach all the way through the thickness of the grate. I have an almost identical grill at another location with a stainless rod grill and it's much easier to clean. Other than that, this is a good, solid grill that cooks well. Assembling this grill is not a trivial project. It turns out that local hardware stores would have assembled and delivered the grill for a similar price. If I'd know this, I would have bought locally.
customer_reviews.author: FootHiller

customer_reviews.title: No quality control- parts missing from multiple bags
customer_reviews.text: Great grill but seriously they cannot give you the correct number of screws and bolts. Two different bags were short. Love the partially assembled unusable grill. I would suggest ordering two grills so you have the full parts for at least one grill then returning the other one when you are finished. Last grill I bought cost $ 99 and had all the parts. Shame on you Weber
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my better buys this year
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my better buys this year. Very happy with the quality and amazed how well it cooks everything. Electric igniter is working great and never have problem with starting. Easy for me to assemble. Very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: All in all a good grill...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this a really good grill. Excellent construction. The ignition works flawlessly. I just got it so time will tell as far as durability but all in all pretty happy. I knocked off one star for two reasons. First, getting the propane tank to hang on the hook for the scale is not easy. Design should have better thought out there. Second, how about better assembly instructions. It is all pictures, no words. Yes I got it done, but it took about 3 hours. For 500 bucks, I think I deserve words.
customer_reviews.author: soflatechie

customer_reviews.title: Cookbox arrived cracked; Grill misrepresented on Amazon webpage
customer_reviews.text: The grill was not as advertised on the Web site, which showed a photo of drop-down side shelves. The shelves on the Spirit E310 are fixed in place. Also, near the end of an almost 3-hour assembly process, I noticed a crack in the right rear corner of the cookbox - this in spite of undamaged packing materials and very careful handling.
customer_reviews.author: PJA_in_Boston

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat over 400 degrees
customer_reviews.text: At best on a mild windy day the grill will get to 350. Only on a warm day and no wind will the grill reach a top heat level at 400. I have a friend who reminded me to turn on 1st burner, wait then the second, wait and then finally the third. Still cannot reach above temps. I will be giving this to my son for him to use and purchasing another model. Not the Spirit.
customer_reviews.author: Peter McCann

customer_reviews.title: Nice even-cooking gas grill for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a kind of cheap gas grill that had hung on for 15 years and finally gave up the ghost (elements finally rusted out). So far I'm extremely happy with the ability of the grill to do direct and indirect grilling. Temperatures measured with a laser thermometer show extremely even coverage, and the grill was pretty easy to assemble and seems sturdy enough to hopefully hold up over time. The only thing I would change I might have gone with the slightly larger 3-burner unit from Weber (but that also would have set me back another few hundred dollars), but its been fine if I'm cooking for no more than about 5-6 people.
customer_reviews.author: NJ.

customer_reviews.title: Holds heat and cooks everything even
customer_reviews.text: Watched America’s Test Kirchen and this grill won hands down. They tested white bread to show how even it cooks. I agree it is the best grill on the market. Took no more than any other grill to put together. Made shrimp one night..put some in back, middle and front and they all cooked even at the same time. The cast iron holds heat well. Great grill for the $$$
customer_reviews.author: BdRobinson

customer_reviews.title: Great grill so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my hubby's fathers day gift and the ignition switch didn't work. Hubby called Webber customer service and they were great. They did a little test with him on the phone and then decided that it was the switch, and sent a new one out right away. Works great since then. We did buy the stainless steel grates so that clean up is easier and I would say that they are worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: So far, we love this grill. It looks nice and cooks great. The instructions on how to put it together could be more clear in a couple of places but we had it together in about an hour and a half without much trouble. We did have some problem with the regulator at first and called customer service. It was actually an o- ring on the bottle that was faulty do no problem with the grill itself but the customer service rep was a jerk.
customer_reviews.author: Cjd

customer_reviews.title: 3rd knob locked up; customer service non-existent
customer_reviews.text: I got this grill off Amazon about 2 years ago. A few months ago, the third knob locked up and I couldn't turn it to light the third burner. I submitted an online troubleshooting request on May 28th and heard nothing. Submitted another follow up on June 18th and still nothing. Today is July 5th. When it's functioning, the grill is great. But between the third burner and the complete lack of response from Weber, this is really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Having someone else put the grill together was priceless.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The grill looks good and lights easily. We will be trying out its actual grilling properties in the near future. The best thing was having someone else put it together. Our technician, Danh, from HANDIGY was friendly and efficient. He was finished in less that 90 minutes. It would have taken us far longer to do and we would not have done it as well as he did. I will certainly use Amazon Home Services again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Nemetz

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Have not even owned this very pricey barbecue for 4 years and the starter, ignigtion switch is broken for the second time. Very disappointed!! Purchased a 4 year warranty and have been trying for 2 weeks to solve this problelm. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: English Major

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS GRILL.
customer_reviews.text: we bought this grill through Amazon last summer...big mistake. After using for a few months last summer, it broke down. Wasn't working and we didn't know what issue was. Gas was kind of leaking, wasn't starting, handle broke...I contacted Weber via phone, email...nobody answers ever by phone. Via email, they kept sending me videos that were useless. Then they decided to send some parts. I am not a technician...I kept asking to talk to someone or to send someone. Finally we hired someone to come and we had to pay $350. Worst customer service ever.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Berland

customer_reviews.title: No Directions!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and is hopefully a new product, but I have no idea. There is absolutely no paperwork included at all. No directions, no warranty information, no information at all. I understand I can find this information online (hopefully), but, if not, this grill is completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Roger C.

customer_reviews.title: my best grill so far-love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Grill. I have had many grills over the decades. my older brother has always had Weber's that seemed to last much longer than the cheaper ones I bought. After a severe storm that damaged my grill decided to get this one. took me 2h to assemble. did not like that but I am handy and with my sons help got it up and running that day. The instructions a clear. the packaging is professional. all parts match and fit. it turns on like a charm and within minutes I get over 400 degrees! love the design too.
customer_reviews.author: Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas/Birthday gift. The feedback that I have gotten from him is that he loves the grill! I forgot to ask him if it was difficult to put together - he hadn't said anything negative about it so assume it was fairly easy. He is very pleased with everything he has cooked so far - steaks - chicken - vegetables. Loves the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's mom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order online!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t order from amazon. Our grill came with a broken cast iron grill plate, a broken lid, and a dented door!! $500.00 , 3 hours to assemble and 3 phone calls to Weber for replacement parts. I hope it actually works when we fire it up tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill. For those reviewers who mentioned that the grill doesn't get hot ... I thought I had the same problem but it turned out burners #2 and burner #3 didn't light immediately from burner #1. Make sure you hear the burners all light. This grill gets over 500 degrees in around 5 minutes. Great Weber quality. We also ordered the Weber grill cover - high quality too. Glad we bought this grill and cover.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Has not yet disappointed! And boy was I happy not to need ...
customer_reviews.text: After many days of research and comparing the merits of brand, price, and functionalities, I settled on this beauty for my first grill. Has not yet disappointed! And boy was I happy not to need the oven during this heat wave. I've had it for about a year now and it still looks brand new (except the inside of course - which the clean freak in me has on occasion attacked with cleaning supplies, but I'm working on letting that go, all part of the experience).
customer_reviews.author: jodi c.

customer_reviews.title: Fanstastic Grill
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the grill after about a month of moderate usage. Heat output and control is excellent for fast cooking some 'dogs and burgers, but able to be controlled well enough to slow-cook ribs and baked potatoes. Porcelain grates clean up very well when heating up grill and using a standard grill brush. Plastic casters leave a little to be desired, as they are a little rough rolling on patio blocks or pavement. Otherwise, good looking and great cooking grill. PS: Some assembly required!!! Don't expect to bring this grill home and throw it together in 15 minutes, but instructions are clear and besides the weight of the grill itself, no real challenge to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Woj

customer_reviews.title: Hard to believe that a great product would come with so many bent parts
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe that a great product would come with so many bent parts. Don't believe it came from shipping. The thin metal was able to be bent and therefore only slightly noticeable. The door in front has a crease. A couple uprights had bent ends. The grill works great for cooking, even if the front door needed persuading to close.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Well Made. Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on the recommendation of Americas Test Kitchen. This grill is durable functional and well made. Not to forget that it has an even heat distribution. It is a bit more spendy but well worth it. It will be interesting to see how it weathers.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This came in good condition with free assembly, which was GREAT. This thing heats up fast and stays hot. I prefer this style to the newer, open cart style so getting $50 off is an extra bonus. Not as much grill real estate as the Genesis, but it doesn't have nearly the price tag either. You should have no problem with meat and sides for a family of 4, or plenty of burgers and hot dogs for a party. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid piece
customer_reviews.text: Took about 2hours to assemble. Pretty solid piece. I had a char-boil and after a couple year of mid to heavy usage, it's pretty beat up. Weber is definitely a step up and worth the extra money. I bought a nice cover to protect it from the heat. Hopefully, it will last a long time. I love it! Friends love it! Guests love it!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: We were nervous about switching from charcoal to has but decided to splurge and by this grill. We are not disappointed at all! Easy to put together. Easy to use. And no smoke or smell which means my husband, who has breathing issues, can be outside with me while I grill! Love this grill!
customer_reviews.author: R. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this grill a year and feel like I can fairly review it. The heat distribution is non-existent. The knobs striped almost instantly, I received new ones and the same exact thing happened to the point that I don’t use them anymore. Don’t bother grilling on a windy day, the flames blow out. Spend the money on a Weber they said, sadly, never again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate P Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this item 4 stars rather than 5 as we initially had delays with shipping, but Amazon rectified the issue once notified. The grill arrived as expected and works great! The 3 burner is a great size and worked perfectly for our fourth of July BBQ. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Raph

customer_reviews.title: Generally pleased
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well-built, reliable. My only complaint is that the three burners are back-to-front, not left-center-right. You can't have one side turned off to cook with indirect heat. I think this is very strange. The box weighs a ton, in part because the grill grates are very heavy steel. The ridges below distribute heat very evenly, and the wide grill grates are a superb cooking surface.
customer_reviews.author: SALAmazon

customer_reviews.title: This was easily one of the best BBQ investments I ever made
customer_reviews.text: This was easily one of the best BBQ investments I ever made. Assembly (other than the kinked flexible gas line) was fairly easy thanks to my son being there to act like we were on an assembly line. It sure helps to have another set of strong arms and hands to help fit the parts together. My previous Weber was one of the smaller one burner jobs---and, boy, do I notice the difference that three burners makes with the rapidity that the propane disappears. Works great, though, and having the rotisserie to go with it is a joy.
customer_reviews.author: K Lazy Y

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this grill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill as a replacement for an $800.00 grill he had that was no longer working well. He loves it. He says he likes it better than the old even when it was new. Evenly cooks everything thing that we've put on it. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Landon

customer_reviews.title: Love Weber! So excited to get my grill
customer_reviews.text: Love Weber! So excited to get my grill, I have used Weber in the past and know it's a quality product. I spent an hour assembling the grill only to find out when I unwrapped the package containing the grill, one of the grates was damaged. Amazon quickly remedied the concern and I can't be more pleased. I would recommend this product and day.
customer_reviews.author: Darcey P

customer_reviews.title: Weber never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: As usual, Weber makes a top notch product. And the free expert set up that came with this grill was great! The gentleman had it completely assembled within 20 minutes! It was nice themat their expert set up was truly done by someone who definitely knew what he was doing!
customer_reviews.author: Carpe Diem

customer_reviews.title: ... unit well thought out in design the instructions were excellent the components were packaged by number and were referenced ...
customer_reviews.text: very seldom do you receive a product that needs to be assembled without frustration not in this case not only was the unit well thought out in design the instructions were excellent the components were packaged by number and were referenced and as usual it is Webbers' outstanding quality and engineering
customer_reviews.author: Laurence E Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Great service from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Weber was delivered on date stated when ordered. Had some difficulty arranging the assembly, but called Amazon and “Madonna” quickly arranged to have it assembled the following day (even though it was a Sunday and a few days before Christmas). The assembly was made through “Silent Services”. The young man (Erik) was prompt, professional, and did an awesome job. A special thanks to Madonna and Erik at “Silent Services.” Weber is performing just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Just got this a couple weeks back. UPS delivered within a couple of days. Easy assembly and appears to be an excellent product. This was selected after discussions with several local folks and relatives and on line reviews. Grill heats quickly and evenly. Cooks very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Avery

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I purchased on amazon.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived without the assembly instructions which I had to print online. It also has two damaged parts. Weber is replacing them under warranty but I’m not happy! This was not advertised as refurbished but I highly doubt it’s brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price for a quality grill.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research of gas grilss before finally deciding on the Weber. I am a single woman so did not want a huge grill and this is the perfect size. The assembly was not difficult if you have the right tools (I had a friend help me). I chose the Weber because of other reviews paying close attention to issues with rust as I live in a very humid climate. I also decided to upgrade from the E210 to the E310 to get the extra burner. This is a great grill and so easy to operate. I know I made a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: well engineered product
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, Weber takes grilling seriously. UPS guy delivered to deck and I began the process of building grill. Everything was packed beautifully and strategically to prevent movement and damage. Directions were straightforward and easy to follow. Hardware and components were all top quality. It was actually a pleasure to assemble because everything was so well engineered. I usually have one gripe when I review a product but for this purchase I've got nothing bad to say. Well... except the price. Even so if you think you will use grill for 8 years(this could easily last 10 with a cover) the price per year is so worth it compared to the low end market. bon appetit!
customer_reviews.author: David Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Weber makes a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I had the 2 burner Spirit for over 10 years. I decided to replace it with this newer model and I'm glad I did. Although the older one still worked, the Spirit E310 cooks much more evenly and heats up quicker. Plus, I like having the propane tank inside a cabinet. It took my husband a couple hours to put it together. It took time to understand some of the directions. And it took another hour to cut up all the heavy cardboard it came packed in. It might be worth paying for assembly. Otherwise I love Weber barbecues for cooking and I like being able to order replacement parts, if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hall

customer_reviews.title: Weber Service was A+
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. The front door was damaged in shipping but Weber was very quick to send a replacement by second day air. Weber service was A+. Only used a couple times so far but very even cooking...nice! Amazon standard shipping was dog slow! 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love the grill
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill. When I received it, the ceramic grates were broken and the top lid was cracked. I could tell by the condition of the box that it had been dropped. Having said that - 1 call to Weber and they had replacement parts shipped to me right away. Love the size of the grill. Easy to assemble (presuming you are patient and read instructions) I like the mechanism that tells the amount of gas left based on the weight of the tank. Lid is substantial, but not too heavy for the "lady grillers."
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed. We have only used our new Grill 10-12 ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed. We have only used our new Grill 10-12 times since purchasing in late spring. Grease collects under right burners and does not drip down to the pan on the left side. Yesterday the grease flared up 2 feet! Why did they change the design? Drip pan on our old Weber Silver was in center, never had issues of grease fires for 10+ years. Just changed the pan where it collected, no problem. Also, Ignitor already not working & no longer have small hole to light from outside with cover closed. We always cover our grill when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a Weber. That should be enough said. Phenomenal product. One tip, the grates go fat flat side up. I tend to see these installed wrong often, even in the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: R J.

customer_reviews.title: Love my grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill is a great size for cookouts or grilling veggies and meat separately, but also heats the cooking area evenly when just lighting a burner or two for a couple burgers. The grates are nice and easy to clean, and my burgers aren't lost to flare-ups like my old grill. My burgers come off with nice, even grill marks, too. I also indirectly grill chicken on this grill and it turned out great. I've missed my grill this winter, but finally got to fire it up again this spring and I'm in love all over again. The grill did originally come with one side panel damaged from storage or shipping, but Weber replaced it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: jedge

customer_reviews.title: good design. A little disappointed in the heat output
customer_reviews.text: It's a Weber, well made, good design. A little disappointed in the heat output. I'm used to my Genesis 330, it's a blast furnace. Although this Spirit is $$$, I'm sure it will last several times longer than most of the garbage at the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: brian t

customer_reviews.title: BEST grill we have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: In our 60's, my husband and I have owned several grills. We love this one! After doing our homework, we decided on this model over the simular Weber sold at Box Stores. This grill is very sturdy and has a very easy open door to open when installing a new propane tank. The assembly instructions were easy enough to follow. There were no cuss words exchanged while we completed the assembly...which is a miracle in itself. We are glad we spent our money on this Weber and would recommend it to anyone looking for a grill this size.
customer_reviews.author: Gailktx

customer_reviews.title: It's a good Grill
customer_reviews.text: I have not experienced the design flaws others have. Everything works great.
customer_reviews.author: cfm

customer_reviews.title: I like the covered bottom on this rather than the newer ...
customer_reviews.text: arrived with the lid cracked, Weber sent replacement in 2 days. I like the covered bottom on this rather than the newer model with no door. It seems really well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: ... painter ruined my first one and I am so glad I was able to find it online
customer_reviews.text: A house painter ruined my first one and I am so glad I was able to find it online...my favorite aspects are the enclosed bottom that hides the cylinder and gives you a shelf, in addition to the gas gauge. The recent ones at the store do not include the door.
customer_reviews.author: Lissie

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Grill
customer_reviews.text: Weber has always been my favorite grill thru 40 plus years. I have actually tried a few lesser quality grills and was so very disappointed in every case. This E310 is a griller's delight and my wife even tells me everything is much better coming off this grill. This is a terrific grill, just the right size and does all the work for you with its design for convention like heating. I won't buy anything else but Weber brand grills going forward. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: cherokee161

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled for a Father's Day gift. The gift receiver called with nothing but rave reviews for this gas grill and was just what he had wished for as the family CHEF.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Like it. Feels very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great. Only tested once shortly after assembly and it works great. Reaches 500F fast. I will update after a longer use if anything wrong with it. Assembly was easy but I do assemble a lot of stuff as I do general remodeling.
customer_reviews.author: Florin N.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this grill. It starts well, has consistent heat distribution and works as expected. We used the amazon free assembly and they did a really good job putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little getting use to the grill. Follow the instructions and you will do well. Took 2 1/2 hours to assemble taking my time. Weber makes a first class product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim 1775

customer_reviews.title: happily, it is very easy on propane
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Spirit almost daily for since the first of the year. It has worked perfectly and it still looks new despite minimal care. The built in thermometer reads almost the same as the temp at grid level. When needed, it can generate very high temperatures. When all burners are on high, the temps are in the 500 degree range. And, happily, it is very easy on propane.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Got my grill and everything is as should be BUT no instructions on how to put it together! For almost 600.00 I should not have to goggle and Youtube it! Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: I think the assembly they provided wasn't done by a ...
customer_reviews.text: I think the assembly they provided wasn't done by a trained professional. This doesn't heat up fast and yesterday when I started it the flames shot out and burnt my arm badly. I never had this problem with my Traeger.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl stinnett

customer_reviews.title: I love this grill!
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. It heats up quickly and evenly . I love the fact that it has a door on the front which keeps the raccoons and other animals from getting under it. It has 4 wheels which makes moving it around very easy. It has a disposable aluminum foil drip pan that fills up with the grease, so no more mess to have to deal with, just toss the pan and put a new one in. It has a heavy, sturdy lid on it which shows just how well made it is. I can't say anything negative about it. I've wanted a Weber for years, it's been worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: greeat grill !
customer_reviews.text: the previous weber died after many faithful years. this one is great , we grill a lot this guy performs flawlessly ! little pricey , but you get a nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: marleyspal

customer_reviews.title: This grill is really good. The quality is what one would expect from ...
customer_reviews.text: This grill is really good. The quality is what one would expect from a Weber, that didn't worry me. But how hot it gets is the main test when grilling steaks, and this one gets really hot really fast. It's also good for slow cooking. This past Thanksgiving I cooked a whole 22+ pound stuffed turkey and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: j0s3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill.
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this grill. My husband and I researched online for the best grill before we decided on this one. It got the best recommendations and the highest grades from the videos we watched. And it did not disappoint! Cooked our steaks evenly with great grill marks. I would definitely recommend this grill. It's definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome starter grill but I wish I had gotten a bit better one
customer_reviews.text: Does an excellent job.. Just wish I would have bought one with more burners. This doesn't get hot enough for some of the cooking I want to do. No way to get a nice char before the center is overcooked.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & Large Grilling Surface
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. Having 3 burners adds a lot of versatility and a large capacity. It is much easier to have consistent indirect heat or direct heat depending on what you are cooking. I like that the propane tank is hidden from view in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan Kelley Harroz

customer_reviews.title: This BBQ cooks just fine. My problem is with the knobs
customer_reviews.text: This BBQ cooks just fine. My problem is with the knobs. Turning the BBQ to 'off' doesn't seem to actually turn the flame off. This is not only annoying, but dangerous. I expect more from Weber. This BBQ ain't cheap but the knobs feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: StageMan

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy anything but a Weber
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Weber, first one lasted 15 years, used it all year, even in the snow and was still working fine when I gave it away. So far new one is great. I like the grates on the new one, easier to clean and keep clean.. I expect to have this one for 15 years too! Nothing like a Weber!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill but let someone else assemble it
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill, but this is one thing you should buy pre-assembled. I'm very good with tools and it took me a long time because many of the pieces look similar and the instructions are a little weak. But it sure cooks nicely with nice, even heat. No hot spots that I can find - yet.
customer_reviews.author: rondawg

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: The weber grill e310 arrived and is easy to assemble, put together in one hour, all parts were labeled and easy to find. After the grill was all assembled the last piece was the propane cover door, it was bent, not bad so notified Amazon, not only did I not want to assemble and they were going to send me a new complete grill which I did not accept as I straightened the door as good as possible Thanks Amazon for your thankful thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Pike

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have had this grill for 3 years. Rarely used. Safely stored during winter. Completely DOA going into the fourth season. I had higher expectations of the Weber brand.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, great girl, great times!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy box that can be lifted by a strong person, very good quality and manual very detailed. Takes about an hour to put together and the final results looks good and performs excellent. Pricey but it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Heby

customer_reviews.title: Best grill I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Weber grill. The assembly instructions were some of the best I have ever seen - assembly was very easy. I like cooking on the grill. It is much better than my old Charbroil grill. It heats up quickly and the heating is uniform. I followed the cooking directions and everything has tasted great. Also the removable drip tray makes cleaning easy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dry

customer_reviews.title: Weber is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous product and very easy to put together. This product was so well packaged and to my door in perfect condition!! Took me about an hour to fully assembly and am really enjoying the grill this summer. Look to have this one for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: One of the best in its class
customer_reviews.text: I have no regret buying this (over the charcoal grills and other brands). The overall build quality is great and after-grill cleaning was easier than I thought. We had much fun grilling all sorts of food (shrimp, steak, sausage, scallop, to name a few...) during this summer, and looking forward to more funs for another years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Hyongju P.

customer_reviews.title: Weber Quality
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my 20+ year old Weber Genesis 1000 grill that I have been using typically 2 times a week, and have replaced bars and burners (and the gas fitting) to keep it going. Starts perfectly. Even heat. Right-sized for us. Also, nice job packaging - no styrofoam!
customer_reviews.author: D. Fick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grill! Absolutely so easy to use and clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing grill! Absolutely so easy to use and clean and grill on. Would suggest this grill to anyone who likes no headaches and wants a serious grill for a reasonable price. So happy I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tdorn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this grill !!!
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this grill in about 2 hours. All the parts where simple to identify and the instructions where very clear and easy to follow. The front door was dented and warped somewhat, I called Weber be for assembling and was told that they would replace the damaged part, which arrived 4 or 5 days later. It's been very cold lately and I've only used it 3 times and so far it's been great. The first time I used it it was 38 deg outside and the grill heated up to over 400 deg within 15 minutes. The Rib Eye steaks came out fantastic. Great grill marks. I look forward to many years of great service from this grill.
customer_reviews.author: larry b

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Not receiving the griddle top! BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: although this shows with the cast iron griddle top as in the store ads, you need to purchase that seperately for about $80. That makes this no special for sure as the in store price at Home Depot it is in fact included the other attachments were avaiable for sale. The store clearly has a better deal. THAT having been said this was easy to put together and set up. Use was a breeze! clean up was easier too.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bush

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a grill that won't fall apart.
customer_reviews.text: The cost is worth it to me. I hate cheap grills that rust out in the Florida air where we live- this Weber is solid. Heats well, and 3 burners provide plenty of space for a family cookout. Definitely do recommend if looking for a higher cost but longer lasting and durable gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: marshall gray

customer_reviews.title: Steaks, anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to assemble! Love that this has a front door to cover the "innards." The newer models do not have doors and they look cheap. I also appreciate the attached gauge that weighs the propane tank to let you know when you are running low.
customer_reviews.author: romperoo

customer_reviews.title: Shipping needs to be done with more care!
customer_reviews.text: Weber came quickly. Too quickly! The base was damaged and I had to hammer out a dent. Also two side panels needed some work before I could finish assembling the BBQ. Other than that, putting the whole thing together did not require a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Mcintosh

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy another WEBER without question
customer_reviews.text: I'll buy another WEBER without question. After I ordered a new grille, I needed to have replacement panels sent to repair damaged panels. After a quick E-Mail contact with Weber new panels were sent immediately w/o issue within a couple of days -- NOT EVEN A WEEK. This is the best grille I've ever had. It LIGHTS every time and cooks quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ply1937

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for the $
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his birthday. He is extremely happy with it. I was able to assemble it solo with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Knauff

customer_reviews.title: Real simple - You can't do better than a Weber
customer_reviews.text: Real simple - You can't do better than a Weber. I have a Genesis Silver that is over ten years old and it is still cooking. Any parts I have needed are available and easy to replace. I bought this for our son as a house warming gift.
customer_reviews.author: SkyBoss

customer_reviews.title: So far we love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill so far. It’s smaller which works for us now that we’re down to a family of three!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized grill for our family of five. More than enough space for our meat. Side tables are nice to have. I like the cabinet for the propane to be hidden too.
customer_reviews.author: RN&MOM

customer_reviews.title: Visible dents
customer_reviews.text: All in all, the grill does it’s job. But there were multiple dents on the visible surface of the grill. Just tried it for the first time so time will tell if this grill will last. I will do my best to update
customer_reviews.author: Alice Seo

customer_reviews.title: The best grill
customer_reviews.text: Very good barbecue/grill. Read up on various reviews before selecting it. I bought last year's model because it has doors on the front, better storage underneath. Weber makes good products.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kubota

customer_reviews.title: Best grilled I have owned (and I have owned 6)
customer_reviews.text: After years of people telling me Weber is the best, and I taking those comments for granted, finally bought a Weber. What a difference. Just no comparison how much better it is. Heats up quickly, powerful, sturdy. Everything you would want in a grill. Zero problems so far. I used the amazon prime service included in the offer for free assembly. I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Pase

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Product!
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviewers I've never assembled anything by pictures alone but these were so specific and well illustrated I had this E310 together in a little over an hour. Everything fit together perfectly. I hung the propane tank and hooked up the regulator then checked for gas leaks. Found none! In 10 minutes the temperature was @ 500 degrees. My old grill that this replaced was a $199 box store model so I was pleasantly surprised to see I could actually grill meat on the porcelain coated grill and not have to put aluminum foil down first. The heat was even across the 3 burners. Cooks beautifully. What a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: rogeroverandout

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves his Fathers Day gift!
customer_reviews.text: I had went online to Americas Test Kitchen to see their equipment reviews. This grill was recommended so I went to Amazon and ordered it for my husband for Fathers Day. We are both thrilled with this purchase. Heats up fast, grills things evenly, large cooking area but not going to take up a lot of deck space.
customer_reviews.author: JACK r. nUGENT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill
customer_reviews.text: I have tried just about every grill there is except the EGG and just building my own stainless and this Weber is the best yet, solid construction, love the aluminum box, stainless burners and the grates are heavy duty. It's easy to clean and the tank gauge is a real plus, no more worrying about running out of fuel. They had one more above this, but for the difference in the money you can't touch this one for price and quality. Thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: MACANIC

customer_reviews.title: Love this so far
customer_reviews.text: Love this so far. My only caution: You need a certain size socket wrench to help put it together. Make sure you have the tools listed. Nice grill. Very happy with it 2 months in.
customer_reviews.author: TG5282

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 30th birthday to replace my old rusty grill. While assembling, I could tell this is much better quality than the one it replaced (it was only 4-5 years old). Yes - Webers are significantly more than the other guys' but I totally understand now when people say they've had their Webers for 10, 15, 20 years. If you're in the market for a grill, just stop looking and buy this. There's a reason they have such a good reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the gas grill
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the gas grill. The propane level indicator comes in handy. Heat is uniform from the grill. Tried grilling prawns, steak and scallops already and the results are excellent. The grill material is high quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Li

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect grill for the average person. Plenty of room to cook for a backyard summer BBQ. Super even cooking and consistent temp. I've yet to ruin any of the dishes I have prepared on this thing. Chicken, shrimp, fish, steak, sausage, burgers, hot dogs, etc. All came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SigIAm

customer_reviews.title: Even and consistent heat
customer_reviews.text: We've been grilling for a few weeks and are very happy. It cooks evenly and the grill temp is consistent on given settings. For example, my old grill on the medium setting might be at 300 degrees one time I use it and 400 the next time. We did ribs with indirect heat, and burgers, steaks, chicken, and potatoes with beautiful results. I got 12 years out of my old Weber. I could have replaced a few parts and used it for a few more years, but I really wanted three burners. I hope this one holds up as well as the old one.
customer_reviews.author: CasualComfort

product_meta.title: Weber Spirit E-310 Liquid Propane Gas Grill, 46510001 model - Black
product_meta.description: Add flavor to the menu with a Spirit E-310. It’s the ideal grill for entertaining a small crowd or a perfect solution to any family meal. Place serving trays and spices on the side tables so that everything you need is where you are, when you need it. With features such as porcelain-enameled, cast-iron cooking grates that retain even heat, you’re guaranteed the best tasting food. It’s built to last with a cookbox that won’t rust or peal over time and conveniently equipped with six tool hooks for easy accessibility of grilling tools. If that wasn’t enough, the low maintenance and easy-to-clean grease management system takes the hassle out of cooking.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Weber Spirit E-310 Liquid Propane Gas Grill in Black color, 46510001 model + 6 tools hooks and User Manual
Grill dimensions: Lid Open - 63"H x 52"W x 32"D. Lid Closed - 45.5"H x 52"W x 24"D. Grilling area dimensions: 529 square inches
Propane gas grill works with Standard 20 lb LP tank (sold separately).
Other specifications: BTU-Per-Hour Input – 32,000. Stainless Steel Burners – 3. Side tables – 2 (Stationary) Swivel Casters – 2
Built to last with heavy duty, porcelain-enameled lid and cook box that will not rust or peal over time

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars987 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
